Texts.Eng:
The Mantids are a largely nomadic species with no homeworld of their own. What few traditions their kind have are devoted to the art of war, and most Mantid take great pride in personally eviscerating their enemies.

 Diet: Carnivore 
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 Health x^green;1.1^reset;, deal ^green;20^reset;% more damage
 +^green;15^reset;% Move Speed, +^green;10^reset;% Jump Height
 Resist: ^green;10^reset;% Physical, ^green;40^reset;% Radiation, ^green;20^reset;% Shadow
 Immune: Insanity
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 On ^green;hot or jungle^reset; biomes gain ^green;10^reset;% Health and movement speed
 Improved ground traction
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:    
 Fist: +^green;20^reset;% Damage, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
 Dual Fist: +^green;2.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset; Protection
 Shotgun: +^green;15^reset;% Damage, +^green;25^reset;% Energy
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 -^red;20^reset;% Energy, -^red;25^reset;% Charisma
 Weak: -^red;50^reset;% Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Ice
